about_the_game: NightShift is an anime inspired, stylish action racing game.  It combines 3D physics with 2D graphics to lean into the feeling of being a street racer in an anime. It has stylish action mechanics differ from the standard racing genre, that lean into the anime them and add depth to the gameplay. Sporting an open world racing game where you can get out of your car, explore, and interact with the world around you.
